title: Best of The Herd for May 29, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for May 29, 2020
description:
Matt LaFleur is acknowledging that Aaron Rodgers plays it too safe

The NBA is trying to get Zion Williamson into the playoffs

Baker Mayfield isn't as talented as people give him credit for

The Packers are always walking on eggshells around Aaron Rodgers


Guest: Michael Vick, 4x Pro Bowl QB & FOX Sports NFL Analyst

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
